notes.note:
Introducing our latest release of Firefox for Android browser — Firefox Daylight. This version is dramatically redesigned to be faster, easy to use, customizable and private.

 - Enhanced Tracking Protection on by default
 - Open as many tabs as you like and organize them into Collections
 - Get to Private Browsing Mode with just one tap
 - Ergonomic browsing with the bottom nav bar
 - Switch to Dark Mode anytime
 - Video multitasking with Picture-in-Picture mode
 - Powered by the robust and independent GeckoView engine

text: We'd like to extend a special thank you to all of the new Mozillians who contributed to this release of Firefox.
title: Firefox for Android 80.0 Release
